document.full_text: a u.s. judge dismissed claims against toyota motor corp brought by non-u.s. car buyers over allegations that their vehicles lost value because of manufacturing defects, according to a tentative court ruling.
document.title: u.s. judge dismisses non-u.s. claims against toyota
lines_and_colors: a u.s. judge dismissed claims against toyota motor corp brought by non-u.s. car buyers over allegations that their vehicles lost value because of manufacturing defects, according to a tentative court ruling.
